title: Large x-height Serif Technical Book Early 1990s
content:
Hello everybody,

This is from Gerald Weinberg's 'Quality Software Management - Volume 1: Systems Thinking', Dorset House 1992.

Looks familiar, but I can't put my finger on it (volume 2 is in Palatino :-) )

Thanks for your consideration,

Christian

Font: 

 ITC Garamond 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105340/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Thanks a lot. Surely one of those which look much better in print than on screen...
